title: Dino Crisis Bundle
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**. Set launch command: WINEDLLOVERRIDES="ddraw=n,b" %command%
description: Three years ago, a scientist died during an experiment on 'Third Energy', a clean energy source. Government funding was cut, and the incident was considered insignificant. Until now.
